en.ideaExplain: Ideas are needed to create game features
en.gideaExplain: Great Ideas are needed to create great game features. A great feature gives 10 quality
en.uideaExplain: Unique Ideas are needed to create unique game features. A unique feature gives 100 quality
en.programExplain: Programming turns ideas into features that improve the playtime and quality of your game
en.bugsExplain: Bugs decrease the quality of your games, so get rid of them!
en.marketExplain: Market your game to give it more publicity and reach more players
en.researchExplain: Research new technologies to make your games better
en.structureExplain: Unstructured code slows feature programming down, structure your code to make it easier to program new features!
en.fansExplain: Your fans will play your all of your new games when they release
en.fanExpExplain: The quality needed to get maximum retention
en.donationsExplain: The money your fans give you every hour
en.playtimeExplain: How long your game can be played without running out of content
en.baseRetentionExplain: The percentage of players that can keep playing every hour based on playtime
en.totalRetentionExplain: The percentage of players that will keep playing every hour based on playtime and quality/expecations
en.initPlayersExplain: The amount of players that will play your game on release
en.cpmExplain: Money you will get for 1000 plays
en.contractExplain: Contracts will give you special rewards if you fulfill them. You need to accept a contract to work on it. The game created will not belong to you, so won't bring you revenue or fans. You will only get the reward.
en.recursionExplain: You created Idle Idle GameDev%! You can tweak some parameters and play your just developed game. This works like a reset, you will lose all your money, researches, items, fans and skills. But you are able to buy powerful upgrades with recursion points that depend on your number of fans.
en.exportExplain: Copy this and save it somewhere.
en.importExplain: Paste the savedata here and click load.

popups.goneFor: You were gone for %1. You gained %2 bonus seconds
popups.hardReset: Are you sure? All of your progress will be lost forever.
popups.kongError: Saves that started outside of Kongregate cannot be imported into the Kongregate Version
popups.uploadSuccess: Uploading to the cloud was successful!
popups.startContract: You have to release your game before starting the contract. Release now?
popups.startContractFail: You have to release your game before starting the contract. But your server is full. Do you want to abandon your game? YOUR CURRENT GAME WILL BE ABANDONED AND NOT RELEASED IF YOU CLICK YES
popups.cancelContract: Are you sure to cancel the contract? You will be able to keep developing the game and release it yourself
popups.recursion: You will lose all your money, fans, games, and skills. You will keep your achievements. Are you sure?

e_flea.name: Flea
e_flea.desc: They are not really good in what they are doing but at least you can idle a bit. Power: 0.1

e_cockroach.name: Cockroach
e_cockroach.desc: Not very pleasant to have around in the office. Power: 1

e_hamster.name: Hamster
e_hamster.desc: At least they are cute. Power: 10

e_monkey.name: Monkey
e_monkey.desc: Having actual fingers helps a lot while working with computers. Power: 100

e_robot.name: Robot
e_robot.desc: Programmed to optimize everything to create the best games. Just be careful that they do not take over the world. Power: 10000

e_human.name: Human
e_human.desc: An actual human being, willing to sell their soul and work for you forever. Power: 1000

e_ai.name: A.I.
e_ai.desc: A learning Artificial Intelligence, always becoming smarter. At one point it may realized humans a disturbing factor in creating better Idle Games. Power: 100000

i_cent.name: Cent decoration
i_cent.desc: Hang the first cent you ever earned on the wall to get more Motivation and work %2 faster

i_betterTypewriter.name: Better Typewriter
i_betterTypewriter.desc: Think of new ideas %3 times faster
